entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 8:19 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:19 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:19 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023
